text: Nazrul Islam Shamim (popularly known as Kabila) is a Bangladeshi film actor. He won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Performance in a Negative Role for the film Ondhokar (2003). ==Selected films== ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text- align:center;" ! title: Kabila (actor)
